or.name: acid
Elemental Acid Adept
or.shortDescription: Prerequisite: Ability to cast at least one spell. Spells you cast ignore resistance to the damage type of acid. In addition, when you roll damage for a spell you cast that deals acid damage, you can treat 1 a on a damage die as a 2. You can select this feat multiple times. Each time you do so, you must choose a different damage type.
